original_text:
All your leaders have fled together;
    they have been captured without using the bow.
All you who were caught were taken prisoner together,
    having fled while the enemy was still far away.
korean_text: 너의 관원들도 다 함께 도망하였다가 활을 버리고 결박을 당하였고 너의 멀리 도망한 자들도 발견되어 다 함께 결박을 당하였도다

sentences.original_text: All your leaders have fled together
they have been captured without using the bow
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 활을 사용하지 않고 포로가 되었으며

sentences.original_text: All you who were caught were taken prisoner together
having fled while the enemy was still far away
sentences.korean_translation: 대적이 아직 멀리 있을 때 도망하였느니라
